attributes.action: urgently request that the popular British DAB radio station known as 'Birdsong' is broadcast again on Britain's airwaves.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A digital radio station which became unexpectedly popular with listeners by playing just birdsong went off the air on Monday 1 June 2009.

The Birdsong channel had been broadcasting for almost 18 months and had attracted thousands of listeners.

Help us petition to bring back this piece of British broadcasting history by signing up and showing your support.

reasons: Commercial endorsement, promotion of any product, service or publication, or statements that amount to adverts
